Title: Relates to requiring that minutes of meetings of a public body be posted on its website
Summary: Requires that minutes taken at a meeting of a public body be posted on the agency's website within two weeks from an open meeting and one week from an executive session.
LawCode: Amd ยง106, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to requiring that minutes of meetings of a public body be posted on its website
